position: Manager - HR at IONOS Networks / LiveReach Media

experience.title: Manager - HR
experience.description: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.....if you are of the same thought then come and join @ IONOS Networks....We are a group of energetic and enthusiastic engineers working towards achieving a common goal while challenging the odds of Cloud & Networking / Out of home advertising, to develop innovative product(s) which will change the scope of how we can utilize the technology.@ IONOS Networks we are looking for RockStar Code Geeks with good analytical skills....get connected with me via LinkedIn or at manmohan@ionosnetworks.com if you are looking for fun while at work....!!!You can go through www.LiveReachMedia.com to know more about us and the product which we had launched recently in market.
